1444500.name: Aisling and the Tavern of Elves Soundtrack
1444500.description: Re-live the magic of "Aisling and the Tavern of Elves" by purchasing the Original Soundtrack that features the music used in this game. Enjoy these folk and orchestral tacks and be transported to the Elven Kingdom of Eiredagh one more time! Remember the hilarious adventures and the feelings of falling in love!
